timeline.bodyText:
@fabriciofx I think this should not return the callable itself, because here you are repeating the returning of the the callable, not its execution! You want to use FuncOf(final Callable<Y> callable), not public FuncOf(final Y result) :)
Also, please simply move the instantiation of Repeated directly in call, I believe it would be simpler to read and understand what's happening.
